name: TradEmploi
description: TradEmploi (or TradSNCF) is a multilingual web app that enables two people who do not speak the same language to communicate in real time. It combines speech recognition, automatic translation and voice synthesis in over 130 languages to promote inclusion and equal access to information in public services.

name: EcoConception
description: Static website raising awareness of responsible digital design. It highlights the environmental and social impacts of digital services, the principles of frugality and sustainability, and provides practical guides for each profession to initiate an accessible and sustainable eco-design approach.

name: Gabarit
description: Gabarit provides ready-to-use Python templates to quickly launch Data Science and AI projects. Three frameworks cover NLP, numerical data and computer vision, with DVC, MLFlow and Streamlit integration. The goal is to accelerate the development of ethical and production-ready AI models.

name: Architecture
description: Collaborative repository for France Travail IT architects, designed to share tools, methods and feedback. It promotes a continuous approach to information systems architecture: resilient, open, sustainable and focused on collaboration between product and business teams.

name: Words n Fun
description: Python module for text preprocessing in NLP projects. Words’n Fun provides cleaning and normalization pipelines that standardize and speed up data preparation for semantic analysis and machine learning models based on natural language processing.

name: Happy_vllm
description: happy_vLLM is a REST API built for the vLLM engine, designed for large-scale production of language models. It offers standardized endpoints, Swagger documentation, and a ready-to-use Docker image to serve high-performance LLMs efficiently and securely in production environments.

name: Embcompare
description: EmbCompare is a Python tool to visually and numerically compare NLP model embeddings. It provides an interactive Streamlit interface and JSON reports to analyze the consistency, performance and evolution of vector representations across different language models.

name: Benchmark_llm_serving
description: Benchmark LLM Serving is a tool for measuring the performance of language model APIs. It evaluates speed, latency, parallel generation and GPU usage of vLLM and Mistral backends, generating detailed analytical reports and comparison graphs for optimization and research purposes.

name: Fairlens_pe
description: Internal adaptation of FairLens, an open source Python library for detecting bias and measuring fairness in datasets. This fork was integrated into Gabarit to support France Travail’s commitment to ethical and responsible AI by assessing representativeness and neutrality in data models.

name: Anotéa
description: Anotéa is a public service that allows job seekers to share feedback on completed training courses. The collected and anonymized reviews are reconciled to provide reliable, transparent information accessible via API and widget, promoting continuous improvement of training offers.

name: Referentiel Ecoconception
description: France Travail’s digital eco-design reference framework, providing criteria, tools and concrete examples to reduce the environmental footprint of digital services. It complements the awareness platform for responsible design and supports sustainability in public digital services.

name: France Travail Design System
description: Reusable components, tokens, guidelines and resources to standardize France Travail's digital interfaces.
status: in the process of being open sourced

name: Grist Widget – Excel Import
description: Dynamic Excel import widget for Grist, with column mapping and per-column and per-row update strategies.
status: in the process of being open sourced

name: CEJ – Youth Engagement Contract
description: Monitoring and support app for young people within the CEJ program. Includes both agent and user interfaces.
status: in the process of being open sourced

name: France-Travail.github.io
description: Showcase website listing France Travail's open source projects.
status: in the process of being open sourced
